price: چې سمې لارې ته ښوونه كوي؛ نو موږ هم ومنلو او هيڅكله به له خپل پالونکي سره هيڅوک هم شريك نه كړو.
arabic: يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشۡدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ وَلَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yahdī ilā al-rush'di faāmannā bihi walan nush'rika birabbinā aḥadan
